data.title: CodinGame emoji system replication
data.solution:
import sys

s = input().split()

for i in range(len(s)):
    if s[i]==":slight_smile:":s[i]=":)"
    elif s[i]==":disappointed:":s[i]=":("
    elif s[i]==":loud_laugh:":s[i]="XD"
    elif s[i]==":open_mouth:":s[i]=":o"
    elif s[i]==":stuck_out_tongue:":s[i]=":p"
print(" ".join(s))
data.statement:
In this Clash you have to recreate the emoji system of CodinGame.
For example, if you type this in the chat you get:
        :slight_smile: --> :)
        :disappointed: --> :(

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn: This is a fake test case
testCases.testOut: This is a fake test case

testCases.title: CoC Critic
testCases.testIn: CoC is VERY good. Kinda obvious :stuck_out_tongue:
testCases.testOut: CoC is VERY good. Kinda obvious :p

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn: Yeah yeah that test case was bad :disappointed:
testCases.testOut: Yeah yeah that test case was bad :(

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: My test cases are very bad :disappointed:
testCases.testOut: My test cases are very bad :(

testCases.title: Bit Hard: Can trip you up
testCases.testIn: Bit Hard: Can trip you up:):(XD:p:o
testCases.testOut: Bit Hard: Can trip you up:):(XD:p:o

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn: DOES not trip you up; but who cares
testCases.testOut: DOES not trip you up; but who cares

data.constraints:
Length of [[s]] <= 100
<<Each word is seprated by a single whitespace>>
data.outputDescription:
The string, with emojis inserted:
       :slight_smile: ---> :)
       :disappointed: ---> :(
       :loud_laugh: ---> XD     <<[not a real chat emoji conversion]>>
       :open_mouth: ---> :o
       :stuck_out_tongue: ---> :p
<<THESE WILL BE THE ONLY EMOJIS COMING IN THE TEST CASES>>

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

In this Clash you have to recreate the emoji system of CodinGame.
For example, if you type this in the chat you get:
:slight_smile: --> :)
:disappointed: --> :(
Input
An string s
Output
The string, with emojis inserted:
:slight_smile: ---> :)
:disappointed: ---> :(
:loud_laugh: ---> XD [not a real chat emoji conversion]
:open_mouth: ---> :o
:stuck_out_tongue: ---> :p
THESE WILL BE THE ONLY EMOJIS COMING IN THE TEST CASES
Constraints
Length of s <= 100
Each word is seprated by a single whitespace
Example
Input
This is SOO easy :loud_laugh:
Output
This is SOO easy XD
